e-editiones
About Semantic Web Technology Ontologies

Petrus Lombardus Sentences

An ontology for the Digital Repertory of Commentaries on Peter Lombard’s Sentences
Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ drcs
a
owl:Ontology
dct:contributor
Prof. Dr. Ueli Zahnd, Institut D'histoire De La Réformation, University of Geneva, Switzerland
and
Gabriel Müller, Faculty of Theology, University of Basel, Switzerland
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, NIE, University of Basel, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of specific concepts in the scientific study of Commentaries on Peter Lombard's Sentences, as in the Digital Repertory of Commentaries on Peter Lombard’s Sentences (DRCS).
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0
rdfs:seeAlso
https://de.wikipedia.org/ wiki/ Friedrich Stegmüller
dct:title
An ontology for the Digital Repertory of Commentaries on Peter Lombard’s Sentences
abbreviation commentary
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Commentary on Peter Lombard’s Sentences, as an abbreviation.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ drcs#
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ scholasticism#AbbreviationCommentary
and
commentary

has Stegmüller's code
a
owl:DatatypeProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating a commentary on Petrus Lombardus' Sentences to a Stegmüller's code thereof.
rdfs:domain
commentary
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ drcs#
rdfs:label
has Stegmüller's code
rdfs:range
rdfs:Literal
rdfs:subPropertyOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text#hasText
has Stegmüller's commentary description
a
owl:DatatypeProperty
rdfs:comment

rdfs:domain
commentary
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ drcs#
rdfs:label
has Stegmüller's commentary description
rdfs:range
rdfs:Literal
rdfs:subPropertyOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text#hasDescription

a

rdfs:comment

DRCS person
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ drcs#
rdfs:label
has Stegmüller's person description

rdfs:subPropertyOf
